name: Square Conquest
description:
Capture the maximum number of squares using strategy and magic to defeat your opponent.

Play against the computer or play against your Friends. This game supports Multiplayer so battle your opponent remotely, anywhere in the world.

Each round gives you a new board so no 2 rounds are the same.

Different options let you play first to 10, 20 or 30 squares.

NB: This version works for iPad and iPhone.
